data.text: Relatives of Adalet Tiyep, 63, were told she died this spring, a year after being put in a re-education center in Turpan. Her body wasnâ€™t returned to the family, her daughter-in-law said. One of ~30 cases linked to the Xinjiang camps that we looked into https://t.co/3zjJVl0npf https://t.co/adG7YvHKhP
